meanings.definition: To speak to or write to (someone)
meanings.sent1: I will be addressing the letter to my friend.
meanings.sent2: She is addressing the audience during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The cat is addressing the mouse in a friendly manner.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is addressing the students' questions with patience.
meanings.sent5: He was addressing the crowd with a powerful speech.

meanings.definition: To deal with or discuss (a matter)
meanings.sent1: We need to start addressing the issue of pollution.
meanings.sent2: The team is addressing the concerns raised by the customers.
meanings.sent3: The movie is addressing the topic of friendship in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: She is addressing the problem head-on without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The book is addressing the challenges faced by the main character.

meanings.definition: To direct one's efforts or attention towards (a problem)
meanings.sent1: He is addressing the difficult task with determination.
meanings.sent2: The company is addressing the issue of employee satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The robot is addressing the malfunction by rebooting itself.
meanings.sent4: She is addressing the obstacle in her path with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The detective is addressing the mystery with a keen eye.

meanings.definition: To give directions for the delivery of (mail)
meanings.sent1: I will be addressing the package to my grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The post office is addressing the envelopes for shipment.
meanings.sent3: The pigeon is addressing the letter to its nest.
meanings.sent4: She is addressing the parcels for dispatch.
meanings.sent5: He was addressing the postcards with care.
